chapters.title: Early 20th Century: The Beginning of Women in Finance
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the initial entry of women into the finance sector during the early 20th century. It discusses the societal and economic factors that influenced their participation.

chapters.title: Post-World War II: Shifts in Gender Roles
chapters.summary: This chapter focuses on the changes in gender roles after World War II and how these shifts impacted women's participation in the finance industry.

chapters.title: The 1970s and 1980s: Breaking the Glass Ceiling
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the significant strides made by women in the finance sector during the 1970s and 1980s, highlighting notable figures and key events.

chapters.title: 21st Century: Modern Challenges and Progress
chapters.summary: This chapter examines the current state of women's representation in finance, discussing both the challenges that persist and the progress made in recent years.
